檿字的基本解释

檿
yǎn
〔檿桑〕落叶乔木，叶互生，内皮可做纸，木材坚韧，可做弓、车辕。

檿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》於琰切，上琰，影。］
“酓1”的被通假字。
木名。檿桑。

檿字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檿； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页559第05
【唐韻】【集韻】於琰切【韻會】幺琰切【正韻】於檢切，?音魘。【說文】山桑有點文者。【書·禹貢】厥篚檿絲。【註】檿絲，蠶食檿桑所得絲，韌，中琴瑟絃。　又【郭璞·爾雅·檿桑註】材中作弓及車轅。【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人取榦之道，柘爲上，檿桑次之。又【周語】檿弧箕服。　【集韻】通作酓。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人取榦之道，柘爲上，檿桑又次之。【周語】檿弧箕服。〕　謹照原文改作檿桑次之。又字移於周語之上。
檿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檿字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
yǎn
〔Sulang〕 deciduous tree, leaves alternate, the inner skin can be used for paper, and the wood is tough and can be used for bows and carts.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" Yu Yan cut, Shang Yan, shadow. ]
"酓1" was passed falsely.
Wooden name. Sui Sang.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檿; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 559 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Yu Yanqie [Yunhui] Yao Yanqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Yanqie,? [Speaking of text] Shansang is a writer. 【Book·Yugong】Jue Zhuxi. [Note] Sui silk, the silk obtained from nibbling the mulberry, tough, viola string.　[Guo Pu·Erya·Susang Note] used to make bows and chariot shafts. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The best way for bow people is Zhe is the first, and Sui Sang is the second. And [Zhou Yu] 檿 Arc Jifu.　【Jiyun】Through for 酓. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The best way for bow people to take advantage of others, Zhe is the first, and Sui Sang is second. [Zhou Yu] The arc skirt suit. 〕　I would like to change the original text to Suisang. The word again moved above Zhou Yu.
